text:
Answer each question with the number that best corresponds to how much you agree with each statement:
1=Not at All characteristic of me
3= Somewhat characteristic of me
5=Extremely characteristic of me

side_text: Not at All characteristic of me|Extremely characteristic of me

text: It frustrates me not having all the information I need
side_text: Not at All characteristic of me|Extremely characteristic of me

text: Uncertainty keeps me from living a full life
side_text: Not at All characteristic of me|Extremely characteristic of me

text: A small unforeseen event can spoil everything, even with the best of planning
side_text: Not at All characteristic of me|Extremely characteristic of me

text: When it's time to act, uncertainty paralyses me
side_text: Not at All characteristic of me|Extremely characteristic of me

text: When I am uncertain I can't function
side_text: Not at All characteristic of me|Extremely characteristic of me

text: I always want to know what the future has in store for me
side_text: Not at All characteristic of me|Extremely characteristic of me

text: I can't stand being taken by surprise
side_text: Not at All characteristic of me|Extremely characteristic of me

text: The smallest doubt can stop me from acting
side_text: Not at All characteristic of me|Extremely characteristic of me

text: I should be able to organize everything in advance
side_text: Not at All characteristic of me|Extremely characteristic of me

text: I must get away from all uncertain situations
side_text: Not at All characteristic of me|Extremely characteristic of me

text: I tend to notice details that others do not.
side_text: Not at All characteristic of me|Extremely characteristic of me
